attributes.action: conduct a public consultation into the scope and acceptability of what expenses MP's should be legitimately able to claim for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As public employees, essentially employees of every single man, woman and child in this country who has ever paid any kind of tax, you (the MP's) should defer to the will of the people as to what is acceptable as an expense claimable against the public purse

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
